trans-unit.source: Associates cancellation logic, in the form of a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" />, with a main path of execution, also expressed as a <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Associa a lógica cancelar, na forma de um <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" />, com um caminho principal de execução, também expresso como um <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> contained by the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" /> that represents the main path of execution.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> contido pelo <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" /> que representa o caminho principal de execução.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> that is executed in the event of cancellation.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> que é executado no caso de cancelamento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> objects associated with the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de objetos de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> associados ao <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> objects associated with the <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" />.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de objetos de <see cref="T:System.Activities.Activity" /> associados ao <see cref="T:System.Activities.Statements.CancellationScope" />.
